channel.title: Studio: Counting Characters :: Java Web Development
channel.description: In this studio, you will write a program to count the number of times each character occurs in a string and then print the results to the console. Feel free to prompt the user for a string. However, for the sake of simplicity, you might want to start by hard-coding some text and storing it in a variable. For your convenience, here is a quote from the movie Hidden Figures:
